pkgmetadata.longdescription: Construct Nomograms for Competing Risks Regression Models // Nomograms are constructed to predict the cumulative incidence rate which is calculated after adjusting for competing causes to the event of interest. K-fold cross-validation is implemented to validate predictive accuracy using a competing- risk version of the concordance index. Methods are as described in: Kattan MW, Heller G, Brennan MF (2003) doi:10.1002/sim.1574.
